review: I think I had the first generation of ROKU streaming devices. It had performed well but it had become real slow. By that I mean it was common to reload two or three time for every movie you watched. I kept reading about different units but decided on the Amazon Fire, mainly because I have had excellent customer service from Amazon and I knew I could return it if not satisfactory. I could not be more please with my unit as it is fast, has an excellent picture and has performed with out a glitch. I also like that it has preloaded screen saver pictures that are stunning and many apps from which to choose. I am very happy with my purchase.
author: Kelvin Bass
